rows.outputs.response: From the context you’ve provided, there isn’t specific information about a well operation in Alberta on December 13, 2013, involving "Alkapam A1103D" or the associated material usage. Please provide more details or reference a specific report or well LSD.

outputs.context.chunk:
3 bottoms up. 

Spotted 58 m³ (Graphite/FormaGlide) Lubricity Pill. Stripped out of hole with MPD. Pulled out of the hole to 3174 m, rolled 

over to 1380 kg/m³ / 73 m³ of Kill Mud. Tripped out to surface. Laid down RSS BHA. Ran 202jts of 114.3 mm 17.26 kg/m casing. 

Ran 229jts of 114.3 mm 22.47 kg/m casing from 3256.35m to surface. Displaced with 24 m³ of active Invert. Plug down at 

18:23 hrs April 29th, 2023.

Days: 14

Max Density: 1230 kg/m³ 

Max LGS %: 11.4%

Trips: 2648 m – RSS | 2475 m – Tools/Bit

Interval Losses: 83.4 m³ @ 2.23 m³/100m

Shaker Losses: 22 m³ | Centrifuge Losses: 36.5 m³ | Formation Losses: 19.3 m³

Other losses (Tank Cleaning/Dumped/ left in hole): 82 m³

Total Invert Losses: 280 m³ @ 5.07 m³/100m

TD Formation: Falher (SECURE)

2X bottoms up 
and spot lube pill (3-4% Formaglide and 10 KG/M3 of Graphite). Pulled out of hole to surface. Ran 114.3 mm production 
assembly to 6311 m with no issues and cemented. Well was drilled in 16 days. Rig released on February 4th, 2024.

outputs.context.chunk:
check at 1820 m. Removed and laydown RCD Bearing at 1551 m. Tripped out of the hole to 

820 m & flow check. Continued to trip to surface. Laid down BHA. Pull Wear Bushing. Rigged up casing handling tools. Ran 200 

jts of 114.3 mm (17.26 kg/m) casing to bottom. Ran 224 jts of 114.3 mm (22.47 kg/m) casing from 3186.50 m to surface. Broke 

circulation at 2435 m. Circulated two bottoms up. Shut in well. Circulated through choke manifold through to Beyond MPD as 

RCD Head failed. Circulated. Dropped plug and pumped 23.1 m³ of 1410 kg/m³ Invert. Returns throughout with 10 m³ good 

cement to surface.

Rig released on June 5, 2023. Ran 114.3.0 mm casing to 6030 m and cemented with 10 m³ returns.

Days: 30
Max LGS %: 10.7 %
Max Density: 1240 kg/m³ | Kill Fluid: 1380 kg/m³
Trips: 2804 m – RSS | 3031 m – Bit/RSS | 3482 m – Bit| 3630 m – RSS| 5163 m – Tools/Bit|5354 m – Bit| 6052 m – 
BHA/Casing|
Interval Losses: 445 m³ @ 12.41 m³/100m
Shaker Losses: 37 m³ | Centrifuge Losses: 34 m³ | Formation Losses: 374 m³

Total Losses: 721 m³ @ 13.27 m³/100m

TD Formation: Fahler G (SECURE)

9

Activity Summary

CVE Hz Kakwa 100/13-11-063-06W6 (SH 05-07) 6031 mMD / 2894.5 mTVD
April 3rd, 2023
Ensign #133
Total Days: 26

Surface hole – 311 mm (0 – 620 m) – 244.5 mm Casing – Gel Chemical:
Spudded well on April 3, 2023. Walked rig from 13-11 to 12-11. While walking, watered back mud and centrifuged it down to a vis of 36s/l, 
weight of 1060kg/m³. Added 1 sack of Soda Ash. Drilled out with active mud on April 6th 8:00hrs.  Drilled ahead with thin mud, used extra 
mud stored from last surface as make up as it was 1160 kg/m³ with a viscosity of 46 s/l. Trickled in water to avoid dehydration. Drilled ahead 
on surface to 500m, shortened up system and allowed the clays from the hole to build vis which caused the vis to greatly increase. Mixed 
slowly and the vis still shot up. Added water, some Desco and the vis straightened out. Finished well with a viscosity of 77 s/l and 1160 kg/m³ 
density. Drilled to TD at 620 m, 9:45 hrs. Circulated hole clean for ½ hr, wiper tripped to 90 m with no issues. Tripped out of hole, laid down 
tools. Rigged to run casing.
Ran 244.3mm 45 jts, 53.6 kg/m³ casing in 3 hours. Installed speed bowl. Circulated and conditioned mud. Reduced viscosity in active system 
to 50 s/l prior to cementing. Waited on cementers for several hours. Rigged up cementers, cemented, dropped plug, displaced casing with 
24.4 m³ water. Had 10m³ of good returns, plug down at 2:56hrs April 7th, 2023. Ran 244.5 mm casing to 620 m and cemented with 10 m³ 
returns.

Days: 2
Max Density: 1275 kg/m³

Intermediate Hole – 222 mm (620 – 2455 m) – 177.8 mm Casing – InverMax:
Made up BHA #2, Tripped in the hole from 79 m to 605 m. Drilled out Float Collar at 605 m, cement from 605m to 620m and Float Shoe at 
620m. Drilled new 222mm Intermediate Hole from 620 m to 1089 m. Motor drilled from 1089 m – 1650 m into the Colorado Shale at 1593

Activity Summary

CVE HZ PEMBINA 100/13-20-051-13W5 (SH 14 – 08) 5511 mMD 

September 10th, 2023

Total Days: 15

Surface hole – 279 mm (0 – 622 m) – 219.1 Casing – Gel:
Spud well on September 10, 2023. Spudded with a 50 S/L gel slurry on September 10 2023 and tag at 17.56m, drilled 279 mm 
hole from 17.56 m to 52 m, encountered total losses. Pumped 3 X 12 M/3 of 100+ S/L sweeps with Kwickseal (12sxs) 
Cellophane (7sxs) and Sawdust (12 sxs) on top of adding the same products on the fly and got zero returns. Built volume and 
continued drilling blind to 140 m. Pulled out of hole to surface and laid down tools.

Made up open ended pipe and R.I.H to bottom. Pumped 23.25 m³ or 30T of cement, no return. Pulled out of hole and WOC. 
Made up BHA, ran in hole and tagged cement at 50 m. Drilled out cement with water to 140 m, drilled new hole to 150 m. 
Displaced dirty cement water to pre-treated gel slurry (2 sxs of Sodium Bicarbonate, 2sxs of Soda ash and 2 sxs of Sulphamic 
acid). Continued drilling to 605 m, circulated hole and wiper tripped to 55 m. R.I.H drilled to TD at 622 m. Circulated and pulled 
out of hole to surface. Laid down tools, ran 219 mm surface CSG to bottom (622 m) and cemented with 16 m³ of good cement 
return. Drilled in 4 days.

Days: 4
Max Density: 1030 kg/m³

Intermediate hole – 200 mm (622 – 2625 m) – Casing: N/A – Invert:
Drilled out cement/float and shoe with a 1070 KG invert and drill 200 mm hole from 622 m to 1620 m. Density was maintained 
around 1100 KG and YP around 3-4pa. No issues. Continued drilling to 2150 m, (Second White Spec) had some gas, weighted 
up from 1110 KG to 1130 KG. Continued drilling to 2187 m. Density was maintained around 1100-1130 KG and YP around 3-
4pa. No issues. Continued drilling to 2625 m. Circulated hole clean, pulled out of hole to surface and laid down 200 mm BHA. 

Days: 4
Max LGS %: 4.1%
Max Density: 1130 kg/m³ |

rows.inputs.query: What were the material number of units for the surface hole using Alkapam A1103D for the job completed in Alberta on December 13, 2013?
rows.inputs.truth: For the surface hole completed in Alberta on December 13, 2013, 10 units of Alkapam A1103D were used
